definition: Binhai (place name)/Binhai New District, subprovincial district of Tianjin/Binhai county in Yancheng 鹽城|盐城[Yan2 cheng2], Jiangsu/fictitious city Binhai in political satire/Primorsky, a territory in the far east of Russia

surname Hai

sentences.english: Fangchenggang is a city of advantageous situation with abundant shore tourism resources.
sentences.chinese: 防城港市区位优势显著，滨海旅游资源丰富。

sentences.english: Pictured above, a view of the Marina Bay Sands hotel development June 21.
sentences.chinese: 这是6月21日拍摄的矗立在滨海湾的金沙大酒店。

sentences.english: The Binhai Boat Show 2011 is based on the theme of "Creating High-quality Life".
sentences.chinese: 滨海游艇展2011年的主题是“成就品质生活”。

sentences.english: Coastal wetland is a vulnerable and sensitive ecological area.
sentences.chinese: 滨海湿地是脆弱的生态敏感区。

sentences.english: I enjoy my life in China and I like Binhai City very much.
sentences.chinese: 我在中国过得非常愉快，我喜欢滨海市。

sentences.english: Up to now, Tianjin Binhai New Area of the Green Wave Control of roads have been increased to 6.
sentences.chinese: 截至目前，滨海新区的绿波控制道路已增至6条。

sentences.english: The towns in the new coastal region of Tianjin are important components in its urban system.
sentences.chinese: 天津滨海新区城镇是天津市城镇体系的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: We were ignored by the Tommy Hilfiger-clad younger group until Marina raised the subject of "machismo".
sentences.chinese: 我们忽视了汤米希尔菲格和滨海提出的主题“气概”。

sentences.english: At present, CPA already has been listed in agend of Shandong Province "fifteen layout".
sentences.chinese: 现滨海项目区发展已经列入山东省“十一五规划”。

sentences.english: This beacon of sophisticated hospitality rises on the legendary Corniche along the bank of the river.
sentences.chinese: 这种复杂的好客的灯塔上升对沿河岸传奇滨海路。

sentences.english: Many marine transgressions occur across coastal plains .
sentences.chinese: 许多海运是横越滨海平原。

sentences.english: Reed is the predominant community on the newborn coastal wetlands.
sentences.chinese: 芦苇是新生滨海湿地上的优势群落。

sentences.english: In fact, the coastal walk Tsim Sha Tsui promenade, the harbour on the side.
sentences.chinese: 其实，漫步尖沙咀的滨海散步道，维港就在身旁。

sentences.english: Cycling around the Hualien sea-front bike trail.
sentences.chinese: 悠游于花莲滨海自行车道内。

sentences.english: With Marina fuming, they returned to cooking their steak.
sentences.chinese: 后来随着滨海福明，他们又回到了烹饪牛排的话题。

sentences.english: The inaugural ceremony will be held September 2 in the Tianjin Binhai International Airport.
sentences.chinese: 首航仪式将于九月二日在天津滨海国际机场举行。
